Generation III.Ruby: When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this Pok é mon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
Generation III.Sapphire: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pok é mon 's mouth.
Generation III.Emerald: Its powerful stomach acid is capable of digesting almost anything. The one thing in the whole world a Swalot can't digest is its own stomach.
Generation III.FireRed: It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.
